Token.Abstract: Bit6FileDownloader handles the downloads of the framework using NSOperationQueue and NSURLSessionDownloadTask.

Token.Declaration: + (void)downloadFileAtURL:(nonnull NSURL *)url toFilePath:(nonnull NSString *)filePath preparationBlock:(nullable NSData *_Nonnull ( ^ ) ( NSData *_Nonnull data ))preparationBlock priority:(NSOperationQueuePriority)priority completionHandler:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSURL *_Nullable location , NSURLResponse *_Nullable response , NSError *_Nullable error ))completionHandler

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: remote URL address of the file to download.

Parameter.Name: filePath
Parameter.Abstract: local path where to save the file.

Parameter.Name: preparationBlock
Parameter.Abstract: block to process the downloaded data before saving it to the filePath

Parameter.Name: priority
Parameter.Abstract: the execution priority of the operation in the operation queue.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: Block to call after the operation has been completed. The "error" value can be use to know if the file was downloaded and saved in cache.

Token.Abstract: Query is a URL is being downloaded.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: remote URL address of the file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: true if the specified URL is being downloaded.

Token.Abstract: Get the full path for a file in the ~/Cache/bit6 directory.

ReturnValue.Abstract: full path for a file in the Bit6 cache directory.
